item.description:
AMC has now canceled this hike.  Please read alll comments to see if a Meetup will be occuring.

Bill Nickerson suggests that we have breakfast at 8:30 at Percy's, 52 Falmouth Rd/Rt.28 Mashpee 02649 -between Rt 130 and the Mashpee Rotary.  Sounds good to me.

0 ·Like · Reply · 1h ago · Mute

The AMC is offering the following hike:

Cotuit-Little River Sanctuary (C3D) Activity: Hiking
Status: OPEN Wooded walk with views of Eagle Pond. Meet promptly at 9:45am. Carpool shuttle from parking area in front of Rite-Aid Pharmacy located at intersection of Route 28 and Putnam Avenue in Cotuit. 2 hours.

Date: February 21, 2013 (Thu) Location: Massachusetts, Cape Cod, MA Difficulty: C3D

Offered By: Southeastern Massachusetts Leader: Farley Lewis
farlewis@comcast.net

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Canceled hike Cotuit-Little River Sanctuary with AMC 2/21/13
